New Records: Angel Di Maria tied with Gonzalo Higuain for the fifth-most goals in Argentina’s history with 31 goals
Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored the only goal of the match in the 40th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi missed Argentina's previous two Copa America warm-up matches against El Salvador and Costa Rica in March due to a hamstring injury
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni praised the team's performance and competition level
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina, the reigning World Cup and Copa America champions, haven’t lost in their last seven meetings with Ecuador
Others: Lionel Scaloni’s Argentina will wrap up their pre-Copa America slate in Washington D.C. on Friday with a warm-up match against Guatemala before opening their group stage of the tournament against Canada on June 20. Ecuador has a pair of international friendly matches remaining against Bolivia on Wednesday and Honduras on June 16 before opening the Copa America schedule against Venezuela on June 22.
